name: cypress-panvel
description: Projeto de Testes de Automação do Site Verity

scripts.cy:run: cypress run --config video=false --env allure=true --browser chrome --record --key d8adda2b-5615-4578-b761-baf3ff136c82
scripts.test: npx npm-run-all allure:clear cy:run allure:generate allure:open

author: Luiz Henrique Dourado
